vector.table.title: Vector Search Index
vector.table.alert.reindexStarted: Vector reindex started. Results will refresh once embeddings complete.
vector.table.alert.purgeCompleted: Vector index purged. Reindex to rebuild embeddings.
vector.table.confirm.purge: Remove all vector entries for this tenant? This cannot be undone.
vector.dialog.instructions: Type to search across indexed records. Use arrow keys to navigate results.
vector.dialog.empty.hint: Type at least two characters to search indexed records.
vector.dialog.distance.title: Vector distance
vector.settings.statusEnabled: OpenAI API key detected. Vector search is available.
vector.settings.statusDisabled: OpenAI API key missing. Vector search is disabled.
vector.settings.autoIndexingDescription: Keep vector embeddings in sync whenever records change.
vector.settings.autoIndexingLocked: Auto-indexing is locked by the DISABLE_VECTOR_SEARCH_AUTOINDEXING environment flag.
